title: Nice view
review: Good points for awesome photos. There is a restaurant and bar on top.There are stalls selling artifacts and eatables. You can see the snowpeak mountains from the points.

title: The Ropeway to entertainment on the top.
review: Nothing much to boast about the ropeway ride itself. The windows to gaze out of the cabin are poorly maintained.. barely any good views through them. And waiting period to get on the ropeway also a bit long. Though once up, there are quite a few options to have fun like Go-Karting, shopping etc. make sure NOT TO MISS the spectacular views of the Himalayan ranges via a binocular stationed up there at very nominal charges.

title: Need to update
review: They are using the old outdated ropeway trolley.. Govt should update it to new full glass trolley for better view.

title: You get superb view of Nainital from the top
review: In Nainital,one must take this ropeway to get an excellent view of Nainital and surroundings. It is awesome and breathtaking.

title: Good for views from the top
review: The ropeway ride though of small duration but will give you some great views of the lake. Going to the other side, do not expect anything spectacular

title: Rope way ride with birds eye view of Lake
review: Nainital  Ropeway offer awesome views of Naini lake. One can reach Snow view point through this rope way from Lake.

title: Go 4 an aerial View.
review: Nainital Ropeway, a 2.5 minutes ride, commences from Mall Road and concludes at Snow View Point, offers awesome and breathtaking views of mango shaped Naini lake and Nainital town.

title: Not worth it
review: It is not worth it at all its only time saving but if ur are a group of four then u can book a cab and go to point at the top its cheaper to book a cab. Also there is time limit if u book the cable car cause u have to return back in one hour..so better book a cab and enjoy to fullest

title: rope way ride is thrilling and takes to high peak where from Himalayan snow point can be enjoyed in days free of fog
review: cable car  spans between low and very high peal about 7000 feet.there are two cable cars moving continuously.one can enjoy natural thick forest beauty.very very enjoyable going up and coming down

title: A fun ride, up and down hill
review: You get tickets for 230 INR/person for round trip. The booking person issued tickets, after letting us know that the ride will be at 3.35pm. They have limited capacity and there was a bit of a crowd. However, we were on it by 3.40pm. One way trip is around 3 minutes. The view is ok from the top, somewhat obstructed by trees and all. You need to to be back within an hour.

title: Short ride
review: The ropeway ride is quite short, but the view of the Nainital lake was great.  There are few commercial shops around on top once you reach there.  There are few view points to check out.  If the sky is clear, one can see the Himalayan range too.

title: Amazing view of Nainital!!
review: As we are travelling with kids so it was a must visit place for us.

title: Its Just the Gondola!
review: This ropeway should he taken for the fun of riding a Gondola, taking high elevation photographs and playing bumpy cars. It costs ₹230 per adult and ₹150 for children aged between 3-12 years of age. At the top there is nothing. Although, to keep you enyertained there are gakind options like balloon shootimg, dart throwing, ring throwing, etc. There are several eateries as well as an Adventure Park that offers some games like Bumpy Cars to enjoy. Which, I do recommend to give a try.

title: nice view
review: the distcance is short so you cn try if you have never done a ropeway, its not that great but kids will enjoy. the disctance is short and will finish in 4-5 minutes..

title: Ok
review: This ropeway is a short ride and the view is ok . Can be skipped.

title: well organized setup
review: one of the better rope way management noticed here, a bit confusing to trace the ticket counter as the sign boards do not indicate very clearly whether its the ticketing counter or entry to base station, once u figure it out its quick and easy, atleast it was so at 9.30 am on a Sunday. 5 mins ride while enjoying the lake view below, the waiting space and queing system works effectively. they have put up a board at the top landing station that one has to take the return ride in 1 hour time but looks like its not taken seriously. Rs 200 per head seemed too steep a price though.

title: better.
review: Costing just 235 rupees per person you can have an experience of Ropeway in Nainital which connects the top where you can visit snow view point.

title: Modest experience!!
review: I have been on better cable car rides before, this is definitely not one of the best. Kids may enjoy once they reach on top with a few rides but the conditions of those rides are worn out.

title: Go for experiencing Ropeway travel
review: Use Ropeway travel for experiencing different. Trip up & down was smooth & good experience. Well arranged & maintained. Once you reach top, place is horrible except for some small games etc. Very poorly maintained.

title: Great experience
review: Tried it for the first time and waited for nearly 2 hours for our turn... but it was worth the wait... the view from above was completely mesmerising and peaceful .. a 360 degree view of the city...

title: an exhilerating experience!!!
review: ropeway starts from the end of mall road and goes till snow view point....popular amongst tourists this is quite an experience...

title: Good view
review: we took the ropeway ride during our visit to Nainital. You get a good view of nainital lake from the ropeway and you are taken to snow view point, from where one can spot himalayan peaks and there is  telescope kind of thing to spot those peaks. But we could not see any as it was cloudy that day. Other than that, nothing much on the view point side, it is same eateries, amusement activities and some shopping places.

title: small but beautiful ride
review: Only problem is that there are slots and you need to stand in line and book in advance. So take care that you reach early and take the tickets.

title: Nice view of the valley and Lake
review: it is a convenient way to go to the Naini peak and you get nice views of the valley and the lake. It is vey crowded at the hill top and encroached by shops all over. it has a local bar too at the top

title: Not great views at all.
review: The ropeway is supposed to take one to the top of Nainital where there are supposed to be great views.  It is close to Shakley's restaurant (recommended) and commences at 8am.  We were there just before they opened and had to wait a few minutes.  We got into the small cabin with dirty windows.  Luckily the windows open so one can get some reasonable photographs of the dirty slummy hillside.  Rubbish is merely thrown out of the houses and the once pristine mountain is covered in ramshackle houses where rufuse, animals and general disrepair join hands.

title: Quite a waste of time
review: It's quite a let down.. We took a one way trip and thanked our stars that it wasn't a two way trip !!

title: A BIG BIG LET DOWN
review: We had great expectations from this ride. But we were absolutely disenchanted - to put it mildly.

title: Good Ride
review: The Ropeway ride was good.The charges are a little high though@230/person return ride. Had gone on Off-season ,so there wasnt much crowd and our turn came early. the riding car has glass panels on all sides, and only one open window to look out from. the view of the nainital lake is wonderful from there.

title: Too good
review: Very different experience teaching at a point very high mountains beautiful sceneries like very much the place

title: Up Up and Away
review: The nainital ropeway is a must visit place. The views are simply great. It takes you from mallital to snow View point. It's a very advanced ropeway. Takes hardly 10 minutes to reach the top. Sometimes due to large number of people one may have to wait for a long time for his turn.

title: Nothing much except view of the lake
review: The distance of the ropeway is very small and it takes less than 3 minutes to reach the top. Seems to be a bit expensive as compared to ropeway in other places. Only solace is superb view of Nainital and adjoining areas.

title: Nothing to see from the top
review: Its only the standing in trolley and watching the lake from trolley which is a plus. Once you reach at the peak, no views at all, specially in summers. Its quite hot there. We just had maggi and returned back.

title: Wonderful experience
review: Standing in Ropeway is a Memorable experience. Trolley sails in air to the top of mountains. View from top is just amazing. Whole Nainital can be seen from the top. Must visit place.

title: Overhyped Ropeway
review: You will enjoy if this is your first time on Ropeway. A short ropeway from Mall Road to a temple on hill top. You need to book tickets in advance if visiting this place in peak season.

title: Adventurous and breathtaking
review: Though i had earlier experience of ropeways but this was one of its own kind as it has great height and length. However the rates are reasonable and it is absolutely safe.

title: Nice View from Top of Nanital
review: The roap way is now managed in a more systematic manner as compare to the past. There are only 2 cabins which go up and down and take around 2.5 minutes to complete one side trip. Each trip can accommodate around 10 pax in one cabin. Its better to book in advance your ticket in high season (no online booking is available) by visiting the cable car booking window just at the corner of mall and lake. The view from top of the nanital lake is simple amazing and not to be missed. You can also do small souvenir shopping at the top and enjoy beverages and light meals too. There is a fun park too but not of great quality and can be ignored. One can stay for around 1 hour using the same ticket. There is a decent waiting area built at the reception.

title: Heights heights I luvs it
review: You can go and enjoy. Why going to the taxi but my spirit says that you should enjoy so the group family because the hill stations experience of ropeway is amazing one and thrilling too

title: Place can be left for optional
review: ropeway ticket per/person is 230rs bothways. after reaching the top there is nothing much to see. just the view of nainital n small kids play area. some food stalls n depending on clear skyies one can see the snow peak view.

title: u like city view from air?
review: its simmiler ropeways u find at moutain. but if you like view of lake and greatness of himalaya then surely go atlest once on ropeway ride

title: Experience the Arial view
review: If you are travelling solo, then I would advise taking the ropeway, get the aerial view, go the top and then come down by walking, crossing all the local alleys and markets. Take a flavour of the people and their livelihood.

title: Closed in may
review: Ropeway was closed in may for maintenance purpose during my visit. So i took a taxi to reach there. I understood after seeing the location that i missed it. Definitely one of the best attraction and people used to go to snow view point by ropeway.

title: For view of Naini Lake form the Peak
review: The ropeway from malls takes to the peak of nainital.  One can have nice view of naini lake.  but the ropeway gives only 1 hour stay for your round trip

title: Kids surely will enjoy it
review: The ropeway is a good option to view Nainital from the top. Kids definitely enjoy this ride.. After reaching on top there are many things for one to enjoy such as funfair games, shops etc.. Just an advice - Please be careful while boarding and getting down as we observed that the barricades on the opposite side of the platform were kept open which for me was a safety concern especially when we are travelling with kids.

title: Runs out of capacity during peak season
review: During peak summer months, you may have to book ticket one day in advance and at Rs 230, the price is steep, if you compare with the cost of car ride to the peak. The view of the lake from the ride is great though.

title: Gives a good view of Nainital.
review: Positives :

title: Thrilling
review: Great view of Nainital from the ropeway. Around 2&half minutes ride one way. Gives u a feeling that u are ascending to a higher n better place, away from the maddening crowd near the mall road.

title: Fly in the sky
review: The roadway covers 1000 ft and carries 8-9 persons at one go . The fair is 230 for an adult and 150 per child. The rope-way offers spectacular views and is absolutely safe . Upon reaching the top, you have a small adventure park for children and a go-carting sport. There are multiple shops to purchase and various eateries too. This is a must go in Nainital.

title: Visit before 9 AM
review: It's a nice experience. View from top, amusement park are also good. However there are only 2 cable cars to take you thr. If you want to avoid waiting, reach thr before 9 am. Don't buy tickets from hotel. They will unnecessarily charge commission. Tickets are easily available at entrance

title: book in advance!
review: one must book the previous day between 230 and 530pm. precise time slots are given and one must be very punctual. only one hr is allowed at top. the views are better from the cable car itself. quaint shopping is available at the top with plenty of eating options

title: Go for the view :)
review: If you want to have the whole view of Nainital then ropeway is a must experience that you would want to have. During off season prior booking is required, like I waited for 1-2 hours for my turn. You can go over the top and stay there for an hour where you will find a lot of games , clothes and eating outlets. An experience for a good view of the city will be provided by this activity.

title: Best of all Nainital attractions, dirty view point
review: The ropeway was the Best of all Nainital attractions, but the view point on top was very unclean. View from top was great.

title: Simply Amazing
review: Amazing view of Nainital valley, a must do while you are in Nainital,  feeling like to be in the clouds.

title: If I were a bird...
review: If you are in Nainital , a ride in rope-way should top your priority list. A ride will give you a bird's eye view of part of the Nainital city including the lake. The rope-way connects the mall road area of Nainital to the hill top Snow view point(SVP). There are only two cable cars to carry passengers both way. A both way ride costs Rs.190 for adults and Rs.120 for 3-12 years kids. At a time a cable car carries 10-11 persons only. The maximum staying time is 1 hour at show view point.

title: Bird's eye view of Nainital
review: Nice activity to experience. It's just about the view and thrill of getting carried away by a cable car to the top of the Hill. Snow view point is just adjacent to the place where the ropeway will drop you. I found the price to be bit costly in terms of the ride and facilities provided. The cable car was damaged, not well maintained. But yes definitely a go for the experience specially if you are travelling as a family.

title: A must do Trip of Ropeway in Nainital
review: A must do very Good trip to Snow View Point from Mall Road. It offers panoramic view of Nainital Lake.

title: Good Experience
review: Take a ropeway from mall road to reach snow view point. It is a 3-4 mins ride upto the hill top. One can enjoy a panoramic view of Nainital from a height. It's worth to have it experienced once.

title: Good for one-time experience
review: Not a big one as you may find in many places but good for onetime experience. Short travel of 2-3 minutes with 10-15 people standing in cable car. In peak season, tickets must be taken one day prior to planned travel by cable car. Ticket counter is on mall road (just a 2-3 minutes walk upside). Can get a glimpse of Himalayas if atmosphere allows and on the top there is a small fun park with rides for children and go carting. Eating place for pakodas and maggie is good.

title: Nice experience, lots of stuff to do at the hill top !
review: We got the tickets of same day being a lean season, but try to book a day or two in advance during peak season due to limited seats per day. One has to wait for an hour or more to board the cable car but they've adequate sitting area for you to relax before your turn comes. The wait seems worth once you get inside the cable car & it starts to ascend towards the hill (snow view point), the view of the city & lake is breathtaking on the way up. Once you reach the top, you are given an hour to stay & come back at the same point. There are plenty of games & activities to spend time there, of course with charges for each such activity. Or if you want to just unwind in nature, proceed towards the top, a 100 m walk to witness the mountain range (visibility depends on weather).

title: Dont miss this
review: The view as you go up the ropeway is awesome. You go up and see nature at its best. Why cant all our cities be like this. If only there wasn't so much pollution. You feel sorry when your ride ends.

title: nainital rope way
review: view from the rope way is spectacular once on top nothing much to see just take walk around there are few shops but nothing extraordinary

title: The only practical way to get to snow peak
review: For a guy that suffers vertigo i think that i did quite well to go up on this thing! To be fair, it looks well maintained and there is an employee of the company that runs it on every trip up and down which is reassuring

title: Oswam
review: Nice place rs 190 for both side. What a view of the lake and hill. You go for snow view and hills view.

title: COMFORTABLE
review: Ride thru ropeway was a good experience. You get to see the township below and people living in that. Then its altogether a different experience when u reach the top. Snow clad mountains could be seen anytime of the year

title: Charges are little high
review: They charge Rs 190 for Adult and Rs 120 for child. Based on the maintenance they have done for the trolley. But compare to walking up to Snow Valley, Ropeway is still a good idea.

title: the view is very beautiful
review: The view from the ropeway is really very good

title: Good economical ride
review: We have enjoyed rosewater ride very much as rosewater ride is very scenic &  having full view of Nainital city....

title: Superb and thrilling!!!
review: Nainital rope way is a thrilling,interesting and adventurous experience. It was superb when  we went through rope way.

title: Best aerial view of Nainital
review: Awesome experience. Gives you the best view of Nanital from the air. the top you can enjoy different activities.Well maintained.

title: A Birds Eye View!
review: The Ropeway is a sure attraction for the visit of Nainital! It is safe, well designed and gives a Birds Eye  view of the Nainital valley. there are tickets to be bought an d a bit of waiting some times, but worth it!

title: Dizzy heights!
review: Good experience travelling from Nainital over the trees up to Snow View. On a clear day the colourful town of Nainital with the tree clad backdrop is beautiful. However low cloud in the monsoon season can come in very quickly..

title: a nice experiance with kids
review: ropeway is a very nice, economical way of going the hilltop and enjowing the panoramic views of  Nainital,this is surely fun with kid but the trolleys need a makeover with more glass around and more cleaner outside, these are very old now,the small restaurants at hiltop also provide small sacks and toys n fun activities for kids....

title: Short vacation
review: If you want to enjoy rope way then only you take it. Cars can also go at the top so so you can also go by car. At the top some food joints are there and also a good view. You can enjoy tea with pakoras.

title: the ropeway runs on very small distance
review: though gives a good view of city and also the place where it take 'snowview' is good place nice view of snow capped Himalayas

title: Nice view of whole city from the top
review: It was nice to see the whole naini lake and city from the top and ropeway experience. Going to top was a bit tiring as there was a long queue but overall experience was worth it.

title: Poor and bad maintenance
review: its sad and old, and hardly maintained properly. If you haven't ever done a ropeway and want to do, then its fine . else it can be avoided.

title: Amazing
review: It takes on a good height from where you can entire Nanital. When you will reach on the top, you can enjoy SnowView point, some games and Adventure park which has GoKarting and some good rides.

title: Rope way : view of Naini Lanke from sky without plane
review: Most important thing on rush days there is too much crowd. After 2:30 they stops booking for same day. But better book for net day after 2:30 pm for which they will give time slot. They are punctual for there time slote so its good to it one day advance.And at end point u can stay upto 1 hr if u wan to resturn back by trolley only.

title: Must visit
review: Price for per person is 190/- for children 150/-.

title: Ropeway amazing Experience
review: Ropeway is the amazing experience ever for me and really it was very nice to hang out in this. Recommended

title: Good one time experience
review: The way to ropeway is a little walk inside a lane on 1 end of mall road. The ticket charge is 200 per adult and 130 per child over 3. Its a barely 3 minutes ropeway thrilling for the kids. It takes you near the snow view point. The view is seldom clear from there. There is an amusement park located upstairs with a freefall ride, go carting etc. Thats again enjoyable for kids. Cable car ticket should be booked 1 day advance. Most hotels arrange for it upon request. It is subject to weather condition.you have to go standing in the cable car.

title: Another must do activity in Naiinital
review: This is a short trip to the top. Its worth the money and trouble. There is a small adventure park on the top and gives children a good experience.

title: Just like other ropeways in the hills
review: Go there on your first visit to the hills or if kids are with you. All in all a nice experience but nothing too great to write about except the views from the top. Which you will get from any high altitude place,

title: Lovely view
review: The ropeway takes you to the Snow View point. The journey is comfortable as they do not overload and the view from the trolley is excellent. The service is prompt and one does not have to wait for long.

title: Nainital  cable car
review: this rope way connects  from the Mall road to snow view point  and adventure park on the  top. ride was nice and adventurous.

title: good for killing time in Nainital
review: this is good for selfie takers and passing time in Nainital. a small amusement park has come up .good for first timers

title: nice view
review: it was like any other ropeway trip. the view was amazing from up above and we had fun. the ride was short though

title: Only for those who haven't experienced this elsewhere!
review: The ride is average and the view is same lake view during the ride. SO nothing special in this ride. It takes you to a place where you can reach by road (so see whats cheaper for you). Where you reach using the rope is an average place too. Nothing  much to do... some usual Mela type games and restaurants. I was there in rainy season so could not see anything form the Snow View point (may be thats the main attraction). In summer its over crowded. I would say go there only if you have nothing else to do or for the kids.

title: Best ropeway view
review: Nice altitude and beautiful view of naini jheel and the city from the top. It is advised to take something to cover yourself as on the top it rains a lot during season and you might feel very cold due to cold heavy wind.

title: check the wait
review: good entertainment with children . just check the waiting time before buying the tickets. there are few dhabas at the top with a kids corner

title: Good Experience
review: The cable car provides good experience for kids. It's well-maintained and takes you to the highest point in Nainital from where one can also get the view of Himalayan range on a clear day.

title: nice travel...
review: the nainital ropeway travel was nice... lot of games for small children are available over the top...

title: Amazing views
review: Get amazing views of the lake and the city and then you will reach to s spot from where you can see peaks of the Himalayas. A good attraction in Nainital, do not miss it.

title: A view of the Naini Lake is very refreshing!!
review: An old ropeway but is the best vehicle to see nainital in one view - - it reminded me of the victoria peak of Hongkong -- a similar view  ( Do not compare the infrastructure )

title: Very good to visit, but try it on non-cloudy day
review: It is at the one corner of the Mall Road, take a walk or take "rickshaw" to reach there. Go for the advance booking which is open afternoon of previous day of your ride to get the reservation positively. On the top, it is supposed to be a panoramic view and glimpse of few highest peaks, if not cloudy. Else few shops are there for your time pass

title: Amazing views of the Valley
review: The Nainital ropeway starts at Mallital and takes you up to the snow view point, nothing much t see there though!

title: Awesome
review: Naintal roles at one of media to reach at snow point,one can see aerial view of Naiital n lake.if weather clears one can see entire Himayalan range n snow clad peaks.one telescope is also installed here to see peaks n small market welcomes u.one can also go on foot.

title: No Fun Costly Ropeway
review: It is a Closed car and we have to travel standing. It travels to Snow view point in a matter of 5 minutes - All you can see is Nainital lake. To and Fro Ropecar travel costs Rs. 200/-.. Time will be given for the ride.  If it rains, ropecar will be suspended and NO refund will be given. You have to travel when the ropecar opens. We had a hailstorm and we managed to travel after 3 hours of given time.

title: Bird's eye view of Lake
review: This rope way goes from mall road till the top of the hill - highest point of Nainital called snow view point.

title: Best Way to Reach Snow View
review: This cable car service is well-maintained. A ride of 7-10 mins takes one to the vantage point in Nainital, from where one can also get the view of Himalayan range on a clear sky day. I have been there on one such day and the view is to die for.

title: Nice view of Naini lake
review: Ropeway connects mall road to snow view point in Nainital. It's only 5 min. one sided ride. There is no space to sit inside the ropeway but I think it's okay for 5 minutes ride. Main attraction is the Naini Lake view from the ropeway. It's just awesome. I would recommend ropeway to reach snow view point instead of your own vehicle.

title: thrilling and good
review: nice and different way of travelling up the mountain..be careful of ticket timings...it closes by 5 in the evening..views are good..you can eat hot snacks and enjoy the weather up on the mountain...

title: One Word Awesome !!
review: The Calm Morning is the best u feel to be connected with nature again .

title: Good view of Nainital and the ride is awesome
review: Pls book in advance as sometimes waiting is too much and even you might not get the ticket during May June.

title: its nice with good view and ride
review: the view from top is very very good. there is waiting of about 30 minutes or more . you can have snacks also after they drop .

title: Best view while going up
review: The rope way takes you up to snow view peak. Nainital lake view from rope way while going up is the best panoramic view and it is best view one can get. Most of the time it is crowded and need to book an hour in advance. Eateries are available at the top and children can also enjoy toy bikes and cars

title: Do not expect snow, in summers!
review: I liked it probably because I did not expect snow to be there! I could see many disappointed families, for not finding snow. The ticket for 1 adult for round trip is 200. Ropeway ride is very short - around 1-2 minutes.

title: Nice ride, good view of Nainital
review: Since we visited in August, thee was a lot of rainfall at that time. But still once the rain stops you can enjoy the mist and the lovely weather. Its just a 2-3 mins ride to the top. the view outside is beautiful. But make sure you book the tickets beforehand as you have to wait for more than 2 hours for your ride. We really enjoyed the ride in the middle of rain.

title: A good rope way to Chill
review: It is a well maintained and a time bound rope way. We really enjoyed the rope way and also like the way it is been timed. You would be given tickets with time mentioned on it and is worth going on this rope way. One of the very good ropeways I visited.

title: Ropeway is good for family with kids
review: It was good to see Naini Lake from the top of ropeway.  it was very calm and at the same time there are rides for kids which is worth to spend some time.  Only drawback is that they gave only one hour window on each ticket.

title: Give you a full view of Nainital
review: In nainital, this is one thing every one must visit, it gives you best view of nainital. takes aroun 3 minutes from one side, and there is time of aroun 1.5 hours to be back on one ticket.

title: To Snow View Point !
review: Located near the northern end of the Naini Lake, off the Mall road, the Rope way carries visitors to Snow View point & back (for Rs 200 per adult & Rs 130 per child) with a maximum stay of one hour at the top. The cable car accommodates about 12 persons per trip & is a comfortable journey offering views of the Naini Lake from the top.

title: Nice View
review: You need to do advance booking in peak time. Best time to visit in winters- you can see the beauty of Himalaya with naked eyes. In summers, its good to enjoy the cable car only and games for kids.

title: Nice small ride add into your joy to visit nainital
review: Enjoyed the small cable car ride with kids. View from the top is amazing. Make sure you pre book the ride as it might take few hours of advance booking. we were lucky to only wait for an hour, which was needed for some snacks and tea.

title: Nainital lake view from a height
review: Its worth taking the ropeway at least for one side either by going up or coming down, one can see the beautiful view of the Nainital lake from a height surrounded by green mountains. There are a number of recreation activities and picnic spot at the top and you can enjoy rides and Go-karting or enjoy some fast food.

title: Very good view
review: It is near the Lake. Excellent view and very pleasant ride. You need to go to the booking centre take your ticket they provide you a time slot and you can take a ride. You have climb steep slope for atleast five hundred meter to the booking centre. The rope car takes you to a 1000m climb lasting for around 3 min. You can have spectacular view of Nainital lake, mountains. Once you reach the destination, you will be given 1h for Himalayan view. If you reach before 11 am and if you are lucky you can see the Himalyan snow cape with you naked eye. There is binocular available at the hill top charge Rs. 20. You can view camel back, snow capped Himalayan range. It is a beautiful view. You have to climb a steep slope of about 400m to reach the place. Also near the rope car landing you can also have a good view. It has dining place but I have not tested them.

title: Adventure
review: This is a great  thing  to do whenever you visit this place.  Be it summer  or winter season.

title: Nainitaal Ropeway
review: The Cable Car of Nainital adds more beauty to the city. It is one of the famous tourist attarctions of this place. The arial view of the lake which can be viewed from inside the Cable Car is just awesom. Irrspective of adult and child both enjoys this a lot.

title: rope way visit
review: rope way is the one of the biggest attraction among children.

title: Needs a facelift
review: Small place where the trolley takes from the base station, needs more activities and options. Could be ideally developed into a perfect outing place.

title: Expensive
review: They have increased the cost to INR 200 per adult and INR 130 per child (if I remember correctly) which is very expensive and normally they only allow 1 hour of stay at the top of the hill. Though this ropeway to the top of the peak provides a good view of the entire city, but too costly if you are traveling with a family.

title: Great View
review: This ride gives you a great view of Nainital. Its a must visit.The ride is a 4 mins. You can opt for a one way or 2 ways trip.

title: Excellent ride
review: A quick excellent ride to top of the mountain behind Malital. There is a gorgeous view and opportunity for photographs on the way up. The only tiresome part is the frequent lie up for tickets, that takes more time than the ride. Wish they would install automatic ticketing as in Metros now.

title: Awesome view
review: A must try if it is your first visit to Nainital. You can enjoy awesome view of the lake and the city, as well as the scenic beauty of Himalayas and other mountain ranges.

title: Awesome view of City
review: One can enjoy awesome view of city using this SARKARI SEVA.

title: excellent
review: it is just different experience to climb up on a ropeway.  little scary but adventurous.  we all loved this.

title: A must visit for kids
review: This a good place for kids as well adults, you can spend 3-4 hours with rides and food and bird eye view of Nainital & surroundings

title: must go
review: from the rope way u can see a very scenery view of nainital and from top end u can also see himalaya range like kailash parvat and om parvat. must go

title: Decent
review: Much smaller in comparison to the Timber Trail in Shimla, both the trolley as well as the distance. But still a decent one if you are visiting for the first time. There is a decent park and play area once you reach up, nothing much.

title: Nice experience
review: Gives a scenic view of Nainital. One way trip duration is approx. 4-5 mins. Cost for round trip is rs 200 for adults and rs 130 for child.

title: A fun activity
review: Getting to top of 2200 meter height on a cable car is exciting and fun. It provides great views of the valley below and lake across. Boats in the lake look like fishes from the height.

title: excellent journey with fun activity
review: The ropeway journey is safe and beautiful. There is a specific allotted time for each family to see the upper parts but if you late by 10mins they can be managed. The Himalayan range view is excellent view peaks

title: Very Good and Safe
review: They offered Adult ticket in 200 INr and for Child above 3 and less then 12 it will cot 160 RS,

title: Awesome sky scenery!
review: This is a very safe and reasonable transport medium to go up on the mountains for snow view. While in ropeway you see a panoramic view of the beautiful nainital lake. This is awesome.

title: Exciting
review: You can see a good view of Naini Lake with in the Rope way. But make sure if you are going to see the peaks it is on a Clear day.

title: GOOD VIEW FROM THE TOP.
review: It is a five minutes travel by this Ropeway. The view of the Naini Lake is excellent. The ride otherwise is just okay.

title: Beautiful Experience
review: One of media to reach at hill top,feeling good to avail facilities to reach at top otherwise one can also go on foot n one can view view of not only Nainital but also entire Himalaya range

title: Decent Ride
review: The Rope way ride itself is a very nice as it goes all the way up the mountains. But on top there is nothing much to do except you get to see the big and snowy Himalayans range.

title: Good View By Ropeway
review: it's the full view of nainital you see by rope way good experience ones you reach at last point enjoyably

title: Beautiful to enjoy
review: We ride the Rope way with the friends. We enjoy the site view by this. After that we see the Himalaya view & enjoy too much. The ride is very smooth.

title: Good Aerial View of Nainital
review: Birds Eye view of  Nainital while going up and returning. Dont  miss the Binoculars View at the Top. Better to complete in the first half of the day. Nanda Devi, Himalayas view is possible on a clear day with cloudless sky

title: Aerial View of Nainital
review: Nainital ropeway is a must visit attraction as you get a bird's eye view of Nainital town and lake from ropeway trolley. Once you reach top, you can have a view of Himalayan peaks if weather is clear. Opt to do this first thing in the morning.

title: Bird's eye view of nainital lake
review: This was our first experience with rope way and could be the best. To our surprise, we found the top view of nainital more mesmerizing than the crowded nainital streets

title: Ropeway
review: Worldclass ropeway system. What a great experience. The views are amazing. the cafe at the top is worth visiting.

title: nainital ropeway
review: if you wanna catch himalayan range of mountain plz do visit this place , great view here you will find three important points ... snow view, lake view, games and rope way... kids can play over here.

title: Good rope way
review: Good view on a hilly terrain

title: Average maintaince
review: Recommend a Visit in the evenings, as the views are blur during the noon. The elderly need to stride a distance to reach this base point. and the area below the rope way path is very dirtily maintained.

title: Good Sence from the Ropeway
review: When you travel through ropeway you can see a beautiful scene however you should book the ticket in advance as sometime there is waiting of 1 to 2 hours. But it is very good.

title: Something really nice to experience
review: Since it was a peak season when we went to Nainital, the wait time to travel by the cable car was 2-3 days ( what the heck!! :O). So we rather took cab (Alto), readily available there to land at Snow view point. But yes I could feel that it would be thrilling experience passing over the lake and the tall trees, hanging in the air :).

title: Small trip of excellent views...
review: This ropeway is one of the smallest ropeway in India... It will take more than just 2-3 mins to reach at the top to experience breathtaking view of himalayas and naina valley.... Entry is very nominal and is a must see for every traveller...

title: Amazing views uphill
review: Nainital ropeway brings the child back in you. Different views uphill are quite enchanting (if weather permits). There are lot of activities that you can do uphill. They have high-powered binoculars which will enable you to see some distant peaks.

title: One time show
review: Rs 200 for an adult is the fee (both the sides)...but nothing much to see...There's a waiting time of atleast 40 mins before you ride so plan accordingly.

title: A short trip but good for first time experience
review: I you have time, plan both side travel. Else club with other locations and ask the vehicle to drop at top point of cable car. You can have one way down and reach Naini Temple area which is easily accessible to main locations. There are some amusement facilities for kids at the top point but not so remarkable.

title: nothing so great about the Ropeway
review: costs 200Rs per person. one needs to stand in the ropeway for about  3-4 minutes each way. good views of Nainital from the top.

title: No attraction
review: This place have lost its naturality, the place has been almost converted to malls with low quality so called play zone at both side of rope way. No point in visiting this unless you have spare time.

title: A must experience
review: The ropeway takes one to the China top. Its 200 Rs for return ticket. One gets a good view of the nainital city. Also the line is quite long so be patient as the trolley can only carry 8 persons at a time. It takes about 30-45 mins of wait. worth it

title: Must do in Nainital
review: Ropeway is the best way to get a great view of the Naini Lake and the town as well. It ends at the top of the view point from which one can view the snow clad peaks of Himalayas.

title: Nainital Rope way
review: One has to walk very steep walk way from the main road to reach the Rope way counter. Tickets are priced very high as per my view.

title: Up above the world so high
review: very well maintained facility provides excellent view of the Naini Lake and the surrounding mountains

title: Great view from the Ropeway
review: Great view of Nainital from the rope and not much to do after going at the top. One time sight seeing but definitely recommend it for kids.

title: Little value of such high price !
review: The ropeway at Nainital is one of the local attractions. The ropeway service has two cabins and priced at 210/- per adult and 130/- per child. The climb last around 7 minutes and is quite scenic and offers an excellent view of the city. Once you reach the top, there are a few eating options and a children's park in average condition.

title: Good Exp but not much to do on top
review: Overall a different experience but there is not much to do on the top. We came down on foot and that was the highlight for us. Please make sure to make reservations ahead of time as they dont do current bookings

title: Nice views of Nainital Lake
review: Nice view of the Nainital lake and city. During winter one can expect to see the Himalayan range from the top.

title: Nice view of Nainital lake
review: The Nainital ropeway provides an bird's eye view of the Nainital lake. It is located close to the lake on the Mall road. The view from the top of the lake and the snow capped mountains is awesome.

title: Rope Way of Nainital
review: you will have beautiful panoramic view not to be missed when in Nainital. please don't miss snow view point which is destination point from rope way.

title: Ropeway experencise
review: Noting great. But it a journey one takes to reach the snow point. The view are normal as would be in any hill station.

title: Average sightseeing
review: This one was little boring. At first, you find it exciting because you are traveling in a cable car and everything seems exciting. But thereon the view is same as was from the hill top. Nothing new. Nothing unique.

title: For rs 200 dont expect the moon
review: the wait for the ticket, ride up and the ride down can be painful if you don't plan your time. For the young do go up the snow view, there are a few rusty games which can be tried ......what else will you do in Niantal if you dont go to these places ?

title: The ropeway ride is great
review: The ropeway ride is great to see the entire nainital city from a bird's eye but the ambience up there is really low standard and disappointing.

title: Birds eye view of Nainital
review: The Snow View KMVN heritage hotel located on one of the highest peaks around Nainital lake gives free passes for the rope way if you stay at the hotel - terrific view of the Himalaya and Nainital hill station.

title: ropeway
review: ropeway is nainital is too good.you get a view of surrounding peaks and naini lake from the ropeway.

title: Cool place
review: A picnic spot and nice roadway which has a great valley view of Nainital. Lot of mountain sports are available here. Must visit for trekkers.
